page.title: 09My hopes and fears.
page.content: I hope that my Mum and Dad get a pay rise soon because they spend more money on us than they do on themselves. It would be more fair if they spent more on themselves than they do on us. My Mum and Dad might be able to pay the bills a bit quicker. It would be good if my Mum and Dad got a big bonus on their birthdays and other special occasions. My fear for the future is that they may be a nuclear war. I want to see the world settle down to some serious arms control talks. I hope that before long we will be building a space station on the Moon so that there will be a chance of surviving a third world war. I hope that before much longer all cars will be electrically powered so that our streets will no longer be full of fumes.
